_comment: PS scale from selected personality data from three wave SAPA-Project by David Condon: 08Dec2013 to 26Jul2014 / 26jul2014 to 22dec2015 / 22dec2015 to 07feb2017, data from three wave survey was bound in RStudio. Item info was presented in English language but participant's origin is specified in variable 'country'. All of the items were administered with the same six response options
datasetApaReference: wave 1: Condon, David M.; Revelle, William, 2015, 'Selected personality data from the SAPA-Project: 08Dec2013 to 26Jul2014', https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/SD7SVE, Harvard Dataverse, V4, UNF:6:9B60JNIFXXKXmyLhABjoUA==; wave 2: Condon, David; Roney, Ellen; Revelle, William, 2017, 'Selected personality data from the SAPA-Project: 26Jul2014 to 22Dec2015', https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/GU70EV, Harvard Dataverse, V2, UNF:6:lghIwf9uBMIg3wHkM8nOEg== [fileUNF]; wave 3: Condon, David; Roney, Ellen; Revelle, William, 2017, 'Selected personality data from the SAPA-Project: 22Dec2015 to 07Feb2017', https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/TZJGAT, Harvard Dataverse, V2, UNF:6:+zDglHZEg5KlTdNuYA1/CQ== [fileUNF];

instruments.instrumentApaReference: DeYoung, C G (2010). “Toward a Theory of the Big Five” Psychological Inquiry 21(1): 26–33, DOI: https://doi.org/10.1080/10478401003648674

items.itemStemText: I act or feel in a way that does not fit me.
I am good at making impromptu speeches.
I interested in many things.
I am not sure where my life is going.
I am skilled in handling social situations.
I can say things beautifully.
I carry the conversation to a higher level.
I don't mind being the center of attention.
I engage in discussions.
I express myself easily.
I feel desperate.
I feel that my life lacks direction.
I feel that others misunderstand me.
I feel that people are against me.
I feel that people have a hard time understanding me.
I find life difficult.
I find myself in the same kinds of trouble, time after time.
I get out of control.
I grumble about things.
I habitually blow my chances.
I have a dark outlook on the future.
I have a natural talent for influencing people.
I have a strong personality.
I have difficulty expressing my feelings.
I have leadership abilities.
I have little to say.
I know how to captivate people.
I often express doubts.
I shoot my mouth off.
I talk even when I know I shouldn’t.
I think that my moods don’t change more than most people’s do.
I try to follow the rules.
I would describe my experiences as somewhat dull.
I am able to come up with new and different ideas.
I am an original thinker.
I behave in unusual and strange ways.
I have a colorful and dramatic way of talking about things.
I look forward to the opportunity to learn and grow.
I when with a group, have difficulties selecting a good topic to talk about.
I am self-destructive.
